Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory90.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'You made it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Good to see you.', 3: '6'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "It sure was no easy feat to suppress Amberia. You've been of great help to the ARU.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Please help yourself to the venison and sardines.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "Well then, I'll take my leave. Customarily, we Forest Guards aren't supposed to stay.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "For all you've done for the ARU, you should all forget about these customs of yours.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "...No, it's something else. There was a blizzard this morning that blew down a third of the Forest Guard tents.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'We need to go back and fix them.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Diana exits without looking back, leaving you and Evan.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'This makes it difficult. How should I break it to them...', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's the matter?", 3: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Well, I actually wanted to announce a decision during the banquet.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "However, if the greatest beneficiaries from this announcement aren't present, it'll be easily overturned.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'My proposal to fight for their rights will be denied, and my own reputation will be tarnished.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The Forest Guards are supposed to be the greatest beneficiary? What are you announcing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'In the name of the captain, I will... absolve the Forest Guards from their status of "sinners."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Everyone', 3: '!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Shh! You should know that many people will publicly oppose my proposal, despite how helpful the Forest Guards have been.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: '...The opposition will have all sorts of reasons. Which is why I wanted them to be here to make it easier.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'No matter what happened before, this time... they need to speak for themselves.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Can't help it. Let's go get them.", 4: '1'}
